   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_protected_message/1,
   36:          muc_deny_protected_room_access/1,
   37:          muc_allow_access_to_owner/1,
   38:          muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms/1,
   39:          muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms/1,
   40:          muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms/1,
   41:          range_archive_request/1,
   42:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   43:          limit_archive_request/1,
   44:          prefs_set_request/1,
   45:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   46:          pagination_first5/1,
   47:          pagination_last5/1,
   48:          pagination_before10/1,
   49:          pagination_after10/1,
   50:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   51:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   52:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   53:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   54:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   55:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   56:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   57:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   58:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   59:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   60:          archived/1,
   61:          strip_archived/1,
   62:          filter_forwarded/1,
   63:          policy_violation/1,
   64:          offline_message/1,
   65:          nostore_hint/1,
   66:          purge_single_message/1,
   67:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   68:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   69:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   70:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   71:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   72:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   73:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   74: 
   75: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   76: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   77: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   78: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   79: 
   80: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   81:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   82:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   83:     )).
   84: 
   85: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   86:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   87:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   88:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   89:     )).
   90: 
   91: -define(_assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   92:     [ct:pal("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   93:             [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   94:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   95:     )).
   96: 
   97: -record(rsm_in, {
   98:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   99:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
  100:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
  101:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  102:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
  103:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
  104:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
  105:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
  106:         simple = false :: boolean(),
  107:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
  108:         }).
  109: 
  110: -record(forwarded_message, {
  111:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  112:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  113:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  114:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  115:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  116:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  117:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     message_from   :: binary() | undefined,
  119:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  120:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined,
  121:     has_x_user_element :: boolean()
  122: }).
  123: 
  124: -record(result_iq, {
  125:     from            :: binary(),
  126:     to              :: binary(),
  127:     id              :: binary(),
  128:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  129:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  130:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  131:     query_id        :: binary() | not_supported,
  132:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  133: }).
  134: 
  135: -record(error_iq, {
  136:     id              :: binary(),
  137:     type            :: binary(),
  138:     error_type      :: binary(),
  139:     condition       :: binary(),
  140:     text            :: binary()
  141: }).
  142: 
  143: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  144:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  145:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  146:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  147: }).
  148: 
  149: 
  150: -record(mam_archive_respond, {
  151:           respond_messages,
  152:           respond_iq,
  153:           respond_fin
  154:          }).
  155: 
  156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: %% Suite configuration
  158: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: 
  160: muc_host() ->
  161:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  162: 
  163: host() ->
  164:     <<"localhost">>.
  165: 
  166: configurations() ->
  167:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  168:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  169: 
  170: odbc_configs(true) ->
  171:     [odbc,
  172:      odbc_simple,
  173:      odbc_async_pool,
  174:      odbc_mnesia,
  175:      odbc_async_cache,
  176:      odbc_cache,
  177:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  178:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  179: odbc_configs(_) ->
  180:     [].
  181: 
  182: riak_configs(true) ->
  183:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  184: riak_configs(_) ->
  185:      [].
  186: 
  187: basic_group_names() ->
  188:     [
  189:     mam,
  190:     mam03,
  191:     mam04,
  192:     mam_purge,
  193:     muc,
  194:     muc03,
  195:     muc04,
  196:     muc_with_pm,
  197:     rsm,
  198:     rsm03,
  199:     rsm04,
  200:     with_rsm,
  201:     with_rsm03,
  202:     with_rsm04,
  203:     muc_rsm,
  204:     muc_rsm03,
  205:     muc_rsm04,
  206:     bootstrapped,
  207:     archived,
  208:     policy_violation,
  209:     nostore,
  210:     prefs_cases
  211:     ].
  212: 
  213: all() ->
  214:     Reasons =
  215:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  216:         false -> [require_odbc];
  217:         true  -> []
  218:     end,
  219:     case Reasons of
  220:         [] ->
  221:             tests();
  222:         [_|_] ->
  223:             {skip, Reasons}
  224:     end.
  225: 
  226: tests() ->
  227:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  228:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  229:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  230: 
  231: groups() ->
  232:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  233:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  234:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  235: 
  236: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  237:     false.
  238: 
  239: 
  240: basic_groups() ->
  241:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  242:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  243:      {mam03,            [], mam_cases()},
  244:      {mam04,            [], mam_cases()},
  245:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  246:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  247:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  248:      {nostore,          [], nostore_cases()},
  249:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  250:      {muc03,            [], muc_cases()},
  251:      {muc04,            [], muc_cases()},
  252:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  253:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  254:      {rsm03,            [], rsm_cases()},
  255:      {rsm04,            [], rsm_cases()},
  256:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  257:      {muc_rsm03,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  258:      {muc_rsm04,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  259:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  260:      {with_rsm03,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  261:      {with_rsm04,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  262:      {prefs_cases,      [], prefs_cases()}].
  263: 
  264: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  265:      [purge_old_single_message,
  266:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  267: 
  268: mam_cases() ->
  269:     [mam_service_discovery,
  270:      simple_archive_request,
  271:      range_archive_request,
  272:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  273:      limit_archive_request].
  274: 
  275: mam_purge_cases() ->
  276:     [purge_single_message,
  277:      purge_multiple_messages].
  278: 
  279: archived_cases() ->
  280:     [archived,
  281:      strip_archived,
  282:      filter_forwarded].
  283: 
  284: policy_violation_cases() ->
  285:     [policy_violation].
  286: 
  287: nostore_cases() ->
  288:     [offline_message,
  289:      nostore_hint].
  290: 
  291: muc_cases() ->
  292:     [muc_service_discovery,
  293:      muc_archive_request,
  294:      muc_archive_purge,
  295:      muc_multiple_devices,
  296:      muc_protected_message,
  297:      muc_deny_protected_room_access,
  298:      muc_allow_access_to_owner,
  299:      muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms,
  300:      muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms,
  301:      muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms,
  302:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  303:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  304:      ].
  305: 
  306: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  307:     rsm_cases().
  308: 
  309: with_rsm_cases() ->
  310:     rsm_cases().
  311: 
  312: rsm_cases() ->
  313:       [pagination_first5,
  314:        pagination_last5,
  315:        pagination_before10,
  316:        pagination_after10,
  317:        pagination_empty_rset,
  318:        %% Border cases
  319:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  320:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  321:        %% Simple cases
  322:        pagination_simple_before10,
  323:        %% opt_count cases
  324:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  325:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  326:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  327:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  328:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  329:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  330:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  331: 
  332: prefs_cases() ->
  333:     [prefs_set_request,
  334:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  335:      run_prefs_cases,
  336:      run_set_and_get_prefs_cases].
  337: 
  338: suite() ->
  339:     escalus:suite().
  340: 
  341: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  342:     disable_shaping(
  343:       delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  344:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)])).
  345: 
  346: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  347:     escalus:end_per_suite(restore_shaping(Config)).
  348: 
  349: user_names() ->
  350:     [alice, bob, kate].
  351: 
  352: create_users(Config) ->
  353:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users(user_names())).
  354: 
  355: delete_users(Config) ->
  356:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users(user_names())).
  357: 
  358: disable_shaping(Config) ->
  359:     OldShaper = get_shaper(),
  360:     set_shaper({{maxrate, 100}, {maxrate, 10000000}, {maxrate, 10000000}}),
  361:     [{old_mam_shaper, OldShaper}|Config].
  362: 
  363: restore_shaping(Config) ->
  364:     OldShaper = proplists:get_value(old_mam_shaper, Config),
  365:     set_shaper(OldShaper),
  366:     Config.
  367: 
  368: get_shaper() ->
  369:     Mam = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}]),
  370:     Norm = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}]),
  371:     Fast = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}]),
  372:     {Mam, Norm, Fast}.
  373: 
  374: set_shaper({Mam, Norm, Fast}) ->
  375:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}, Mam]),
  376:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}, Norm]),
  377:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}, Fast]),
  378:     rpc_apply(shaper_srv, reset_all_shapers, [host()]).
  379: 
  380: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  381:    C = configuration(Group),
  382:    B = basic_group(Group),
  383:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  384:         skip ->
  385:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  386:         Config0 ->
  387:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  388:                    [Group, C, B]),
  389:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  390:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  391:     end.
  392: 
  393: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  394:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  395:     case C of
  396:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  397:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  398:         _ ->
  399:             Config0
  400:     end.
  401: 
  402: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  403:     delete_users(Config),
  404:     C = configuration(Group),
  405:     B = basic_group(Group),
  406:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  407: 
  408: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  409:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  410: init_modules(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  411:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  412: init_modules(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  413:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  414: 
  415: init_modules(C, muc03, Config) ->
  416:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  417: init_modules(C, muc04, Config) ->
  418:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  419: 
  420: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  421:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  426:     Config;
  427: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  428:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  434:     Config;
  435: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm, simple]),
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  441:     Config;
  442: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  451:     Config;
  452: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  459:     Config;
  460: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  468:     Config;
  469: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  476:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  479:     Config;
  480: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  486:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  489:     Config;
  490: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  491:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  498:     Config;
  499: 
  500: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  504:     Config;
  505: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  506:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  507:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  511:     Config;
  512: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc, Config) ->
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [muc, simple]),
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  516:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  517:     Config;
  518: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  519:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  523:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  524:     Config;
  525: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  526:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  528:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  530:     Config;
  531: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  532:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  537:     Config;
  538: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  539:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  540:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  541:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  543:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  545:     Config;
  546: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  547:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  548:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  549:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  550:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  551:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  552:     Config;
  553: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  554:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  555:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  556:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  557:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  558:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  559:     Config;
  560: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  561:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  562:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  563:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  564:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  565:     Config;
  566: init_modules(odbc_simple, _, Config) ->
  567:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  568:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, simple]),
  569:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  570:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  571:     Config;
  572: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  573:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  574:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  575:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  576:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  577:     Config;
  578: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  579:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  580:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  581:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), % 1ms
  582:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  583:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  584:     Config;
  585: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  586:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  587:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm, muc]),
  588:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  589:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  590:     Config;
  591: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  592:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  593:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  594:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  595:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  596:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  597:     Config;
  598: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  599:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  600:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  601:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  602:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  603:     Config;
  604: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  605:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  606:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  607:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  608:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  609:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  610:     Config;
  611: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  612:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  613:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  614:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  615:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  616:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  617:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  618:     Config;
  619: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  620:     skip;
  621: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  622:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  623:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  624:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  625:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  626:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  627:     Config.
  628: 
  629: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  630:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  631:     Config.
  632: 
  633: mam_modules() ->
  634:     [mod_mam,
  635:      mod_mam_muc,
  636:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  637:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  638:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  639:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  640:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  641:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  642:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  643:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  644:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  645:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  646:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  647:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  648:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  649:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  650: 
  651: init_state(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  652:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  653:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  654: init_state(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  655:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  656:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  657: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  658:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  659:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  660:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  661:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  662: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  663:     Config;
  664: init_state(_, muc03, Config) ->
  665:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  666: init_state(_, muc04, Config) ->
  667:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  668: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  669:     Config;
  670: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  671:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  672: init_state(_, rsm03, Config) ->
  673:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  674:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  675: init_state(_, rsm04, Config) ->
  676:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  677:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  678: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  679:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  680:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  681: init_state(_, with_rsm03, Config) ->
  682:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  683:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  684: init_state(_, with_rsm04, Config) ->
  685:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  686:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  687: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  688:     clean_archives(Config);
  689: init_state(_, mam03, Config) ->
  690:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  691:     clean_archives(Config1);
  692: init_state(_, mam04, Config) ->
  693:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  694:     clean_archives(Config1);
  695: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  696:     clean_archives(Config).
  697: 
  698: mam03_props() ->
  699:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  700:      {final_message, true},             %% expect final message with <fin/> inside
  701:      {result_format, mess_fin},         %% RSM is inside final message
  702:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v03()}].    %% v0.3 namespace
  703: 
  704: mam04_props() ->
  705:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  706:      {result_format, iq_fin},           %% RSM is inside iq with <fin/> inside
  707:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v04()}].
  708: 
  709: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  710:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  711:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  712:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  713:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  714:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  715:                                        ],
  716:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  717:                  _ ->
  718:                      ConfigIn
  719:              end,
  720:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  721: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  722:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  723: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  724:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  725: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  726:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  727: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  728:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  729: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  730:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  731:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  732: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  733:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  734:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  735: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  736:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  737:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  738: init_per_testcase(C=nostore_hint, Config) ->
  739:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config); %% skip bootstrap & clean to safe time
  740: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  741:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  742:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  743: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  744:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  745:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  746: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  747:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  748: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  749:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  750: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  751:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  752: init_per_testcase(C=muc_protected_message, Config) ->
  753:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  754: init_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_protected_room_access, Config) ->
  755:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_protected_room(Config));
  756: init_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  757:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_protected_room(Config));
  758: init_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  759:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  760: init_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  761:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  762: init_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  763:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  764: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  765:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  766:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  767: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  768:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  769: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  770:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  771: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  772:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  773: 
  774: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  775:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  776:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  777:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  778:         _ ->
  779:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  780:     end.
  781: 
  782: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  783:     destroy_room(Config),
  784:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  785: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  786:     destroy_room(Config),
  787:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  788: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  789:     destroy_room(Config),
  790:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  791: end_per_testcase(C=muc_protected_message, Config) ->
  792:     destroy_room(Config),
  793:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  794: end_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_protected_room_access, Config) ->
  795:     destroy_room(Config),
  796:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  797: end_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  798:     destroy_room(Config),
  799:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  800: end_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  801:     destroy_room(Config),
  802:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  803: end_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  804:     destroy_room(Config),
  805:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  806: end_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_for_your_own_messages_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  807:     destroy_room(Config),
  808:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  809: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  810:     destroy_room(Config),
  811:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  812: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  813:     destroy_room(Config),
  814:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  815: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  816:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  817: 
  818: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  819:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  820:     orelse
  821:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  822:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  823:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  824: 
  825: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  826:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  827: 
  828: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  829:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  830: 
  831: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  832:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  833:         non_existing -> ok;
  834:         false        -> ok;
  835:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  836:     end.
  837: 
  838: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  839:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  840:     ok.
  841: 
  842: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  843:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  844:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  845:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  846:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  847:     Result ->
  848:         Result
  849:     end.
  850: 
  851: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  852:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  853:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  854:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  855: 
  856: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  857: %% Group name helpers
  858: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  859: 
  860: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  861:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  862: 
  863: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  864: configuration(Group) ->
  865:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  866: 
  867: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  868: %% will be tested.
  869: %%
  870: %% Example:
  871: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  872: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  873: %% @end
  874: make_greedy(List) ->
  875:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  876: 
  877: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  878: basic_group(Group) ->
  879:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  880: 
  881: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  882:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  883:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  884:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  885: 
  886: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  887:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  888: 
  889: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  890:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  891:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  892:         true -> PrefixA;
  893:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  894:     end.
  895: 
  896: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  897:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  898: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  899:     Target.
  900: 
  901: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  902:     Tail.
  903: 
  904: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  905: %% Adhoc tests
  906: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  907: 
  908: %% Querying the archive for messages
  909: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  910:     P = ?config(props, ConfigIn),
  911:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  912:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  913:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  914:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  915:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  916:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  917:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  918:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  919:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  920:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  921:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  922:         Res = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  923:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, Res),
  924:         assert_respond_query_id(P, <<"q1">>, parse_result_iq(P, Res)),
  925:         ok
  926:         end,
  927:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  928:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  929:                       ],
  930:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  931:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  932: 
  933: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  934:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  935:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  936:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  937:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  938: 
  939:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  940: 
  941:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  942:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID)),
  943:         assert_respond_size(P, CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  944:         ok
  945:         end,
  946:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  947: 
  948: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  949:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  950:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  951:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  952:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  953: 
  954:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  955: 
  956:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(P, <<>>),
  957:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  958:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  959:         assert_respond_size(P, MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  960: 
  961:         ok
  962:         end,
  963:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  964: 
  965: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  966:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  967:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  968:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  969:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  970: 
  971:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  972:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  973:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  974: 
  975:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID),
  976:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  977:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  978: 
  979:         assert_respond_size(P, Len, Result),
  980:         ok
  981:         end,
  982:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  983: 
  984: archived(Config) ->
  985:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  986:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  987:         %% Archive must be empty.
  988:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  989:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  990: 
  991:         %% Bob receives a message.
  992:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  993:         try
  994:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  995:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  996:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  997:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  998:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  999: 
 1000:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
 1001: 
 1002:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1003:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1004:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1005:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1006:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1007:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
 1008:         ok
 1009:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1010:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1011:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1012:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1013:         end
 1014:         end,
 1015:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1016: 
 1017: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
 1018:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1019:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1020:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1021:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1022: 
 1023:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1024:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1025:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1026:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1027:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1028: 
 1029:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
 1030:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1031:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1032:         ok
 1033:         end,
 1034:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1035: 
 1036: strip_archived(Config) ->
 1037:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1038:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1039:         %% Archive must be empty.
 1040:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1041:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1042:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
 1043:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1044:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
 1045: 
 1046:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1047:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1048:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1049:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1050:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1051:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1052:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1053: 
 1054:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
 1055: 
 1056:         try
 1057:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1058:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1059:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1060:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1061:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1062:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1063:         ok
 1064:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1065:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1066:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1067:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1068:         end
 1069:         end,
 1070:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1071: 
 1072: respond_messages(#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1073:     Messages.
 1074: 
 1075: respond_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ}) ->
 1076:     IQ.
 1077: 
 1078: get_prop(Key, undefined) ->
 1079:     get_prop(Key, []);
 1080: get_prop(final_message, P) ->
 1081:     proplists:get_bool(final_message, P);
 1082: get_prop(result_format, P) ->
 1083:     proplists:get_value(result_format, P, iq_query);
 1084: get_prop(mam_ns, P) ->
 1085:     proplists:get_value(mam_ns, P, mam_ns_binary());
 1086: get_prop(data_form, P) ->
 1087:     proplists:get_bool(data_form, P).
 1088: 
 1089: wait_archive_respond(P, User) ->
 1090:     case get_prop(final_message, P) of
 1091:         true ->
 1092:             wait_archive_respond_fin(User);
 1093:         false ->
 1094:             wait_archive_respond_nofin(User)
 1095:     end.
 1096: 
 1097: wait_archive_respond_fin(User) ->
 1098:     %% rot1
 1099:     [IQ|MessagesAndFin] = wait_archive_respond_v03(User),
 1100:     [Fin|Messages] = lists:reverse(MessagesAndFin),
 1101:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1102:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1103:        respond_fin=Fin,
 1104:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1105: 
 1106: wait_archive_respond_nofin(User) ->
 1107:     %% rot1
 1108:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond_v02(User)),
 1109:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1110:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1111:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1112: 
 1113: %% MAM v0.2 respond
 1114: wait_archive_respond_v02(User) ->
 1115:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1116:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
 1117:         true ->
 1118:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
 1119:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1120:         false -> ok
 1121:     end,
 1122:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
 1123:         true  -> [S];
 1124:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond_v02(User)]
 1125:     end.
 1126: 
 1127: %% MAM v0.3 respond
 1128: wait_archive_respond_v03(User) ->
 1129:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1130:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(IQ) of
 1131:         true ->
 1132:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [IQ]),
 1133:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1134:         false -> ok
 1135:     end,
 1136:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1137:     [IQ|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)].
 1138: 
 1139: wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User) ->
 1140:     M = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1141:     escalus:assert(is_message, M),
 1142:     case is_final_message(M) of
 1143:         true ->
 1144:             [M];
 1145:         false ->
 1146:             [M|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)]
 1147:     end.
 1148: 
 1149: is_final_message(M) ->
 1150:     undefined =/= exml_query:subelement(M, <<"fin">>).
 1151: 
 1152: assert_respond_size(P, Size, Respond=#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages})
 1153:       when length(Messages) =:= Size ->
 1154:     Respond;
 1155: assert_respond_size(P, ExpectedSize, #mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1156:     RespondSize = length(Messages) - 1,
 1157:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
 1158:     %% void()
 1159: 
 1160: assert_respond_query_id(_P, _ExpectedQueryId, #result_iq{query_id=not_supported}) ->
 1161:     ok;
 1162: assert_respond_query_id(_P, ExpectedQueryId, #result_iq{query_id=QueryId}) ->
 1163:     ?assert_equal(ExpectedQueryId, QueryId).
 1164: 
 1165: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
 1166: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
 1167: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
 1168: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
 1169: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
 1170: policy_violation(Config) ->
 1171:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1172:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1173:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1174:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
 1175:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 1176:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1177:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
 1178:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
 1179:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
 1180:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1181:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
 1182:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"will_fail">>)),
 1183:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1184:         try
 1185:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
 1186:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
 1187:             ok
 1188:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1189:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1190:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
 1191:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1192:         end
 1193:         end,
 1194:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1195: 
 1196: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
 1197: offline_message(Config) ->
 1198:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
 1199:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1200:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1201:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
 1202:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1203:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
 1204:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1205:         ok
 1206:         end,
 1207:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
 1208: 
 1209:     %% Bob logs in
 1210:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
 1211: 
 1212:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
 1213:     %% will be delivered automatically.
 1214: 
 1215:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
 1216:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
 1217: 
 1218:     %% Bob checks his archive.
 1219:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1220:     ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1221:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1222: 
 1223:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1224: 
 1225: nostore_hint(Config) ->
 1226:     Msg = <<"So secret">>,
 1227:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1228:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1229:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob with a hint.
 1230:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1231:                      add_nostore_hint(escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg))),
 1232:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1233:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 1000),
 1234: 
 1235:         %% Bob checks his archive.
 1236:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1237:         ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1238:         assert_not_stored(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1239:         ok
 1240:         end,
 1241:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1242: 
 1243: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1244:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1245:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1246:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1247:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1248:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1249:             [Mess] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1250:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1251:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1252:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1253:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1254:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1255:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1256:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1257:             ok
 1258:         end,
 1259:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1260: 
 1261: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1262:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1263:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1264:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1265:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1266:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1267:             AllMessages = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize,
 1268:                 wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1269:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1270:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1271:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1272:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1273:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1274:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1275:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1276:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1277:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1278:             assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1279:             ok
 1280:         end,
 1281:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1282: 
 1283: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1284:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1285:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1286:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1287:             [begin
 1288:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1289:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1290:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1291:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1292:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1293:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1294:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1295:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1296:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1297:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1298:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1299:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1300:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1301:             ok
 1302:         end,
 1303:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1304: 
 1305: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1306:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1307:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1308:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1309:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1310:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1311:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1312:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1313: 
 1314:         %% Bob received presences.
 1315:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1316: 
 1317:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1318:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1319: 
 1320:         %% Alice sends another message to Bob.
 1321:         %% The message is not archived by the room.
 1322:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1323:         escalus:assert(is_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1324: 
 1325:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1326: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1327: 
 1328:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1329:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1330:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1331:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1332:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1333:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1334:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1335:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1336:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1337:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1338: 
 1339:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1340: 
 1341:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1342:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1343:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1344:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody,
 1345:                            message_to=MsgTo, message_from=MsgFrom} =
 1346:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1347:         %% XEP: the 'to' of the forwarded stanza MUST be empty
 1348:         ?assert_equal_extra(<<>>, MsgTo, message_to),
 1349:         %% XEP: the 'from' MUST be the occupant JID of the sender of the archived message
 1350:         ?assert_equal_extra(room_address(Room, nick(Alice)), MsgFrom, message_from),
 1351: 
 1352:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1353:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1354:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1355:         ?assert_equal_extra(true, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1356:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1357:         ok
 1358:         end,
 1359:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1360: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1361: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1362:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1363:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1364:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1365:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1366:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1367:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1368:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1369: 
 1370:         %% Bob received presences.
 1371:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1372: 
 1373:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1374:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1375: 
 1376:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1377:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1378: 
 1379:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1380:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1381:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1382:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1383:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1384:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1385:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1386:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1387:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1388:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1389:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1390:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1391:         ok
 1392:     end,
 1393:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1394: 
 1395: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1396:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1397:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1398:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1399:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1400:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1401:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1402:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1403:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1404:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1405: 
 1406:         %% Alice received presences.
 1407:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1408:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1409: 
 1410:         %% Bob received presences.
 1411:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1412: 
 1413:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1414:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1415: 
 1416:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1417:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1418:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1419: 
 1420:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1421: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1422: 
 1423:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1424:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1425:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1426: 
 1427:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1428:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1429: 
 1430:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1431:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1432:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1433: 
 1434:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1435:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1436:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1437:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1438:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1439:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1440:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1441:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1442:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1443:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1444: 
 1445:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1446: 
 1447:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1448: 
 1449:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1450: 
 1451:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1452:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1453:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1454:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1455:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1456:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1457:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1458:         ok
 1459:         end,
 1460:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1461: 
 1462: muc_protected_message(Config) ->
 1463:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1464:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1465:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1466:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1467:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1468:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1469: 
 1470:         %% Bob received presences.
 1471:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1472: 
 1473:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1474:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1475: 
 1476:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1477:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1478:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1479:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1480: 
 1481:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1482:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1483:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1484: 
 1485:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1486:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1487:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1488:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1489:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1490:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1491: 
 1492:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1493:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1494:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1495:         ok
 1496:         end,
 1497:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1498: 
 1499: muc_deny_protected_room_access(Config) ->
 1500:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1501:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1502:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1503:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1504:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1505:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1506:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1507: 
 1508:         %% mod_muc returns error presence.
 1509:         Err1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1510:         escalus_assert:is_error(Err1, <<"auth">>, <<"not-authorized">>),
 1511: 
 1512:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1513: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1514: 
 1515:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1516:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1517:         Err2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1518:         %% mod_mam_muc returns error iq.
 1519:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Err2),
 1520:         ok
 1521:         end,
 1522:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1523: 
 1524: %% @doc Allow access to non-in-room users who able to connect
 1525: muc_allow_access_to_owner(Config) ->
 1526:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1527:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1528:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1529:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1530: 
 1531:         %% Alice (not in room) requests the room's archive.
 1532:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1533:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1534:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1535:         ok
 1536:         end,
 1537:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1538: 
 1539: muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms(Config) ->
 1540:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1541:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1542:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1543:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1544:         Text = <<"Hi all!">>,
 1545:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1546:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1547: 
 1548:         %% Bob received presences.
 1549:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1550: 
 1551:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1552:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1553: 
 1554:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1555: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1556: 
 1557:         %% Bob receives the message.
 1558:         escalus:assert(is_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1559: 
 1560:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1561: 
 1562:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1563:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1564: 
 1565:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1566:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1567: 
 1568:         ?assert_equal_extra(false, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1569:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1570:         ok
 1571:         end,
 1572:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1573:

 1637:

 1639:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1640:         ok
 1641:         end,

 1643: 
 1644: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1645: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1646:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1647:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1648:         %% Send
 1649:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1650:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1651:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1652:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1653:         %%   </query>
 1654:         %% </iq>
 1655:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request(P)),
 1656:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1657:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1658:         ok
 1659:         end,
 1660:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1661: 
 1662: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1663:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1664:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1665:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1666:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1667:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1668:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1669:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1670:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1671:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1672:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1673:         %% Send
 1674:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1675:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1676:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1677:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1678:         %%   </query>
 1679:         %% </iq>
 1680:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, StartTime, StopTime)),
 1681:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1682:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1683:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1684:         [M1,M2|_] = respond_messages(Result),
 1685:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1686:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1687:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1688:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1689:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1690:         ok
 1691:         end,
 1692:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1693: 
 1694: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1695:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1696:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1697:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1698:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1699: 
 1700: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1701: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1702: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1703:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1704:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1705:         %% Send
 1706:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1707:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1708:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1709:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1710:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1711:         %%       </set>
 1712:         %%   </query>
 1713:         %% </iq>
 1714:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request(P)),
 1715:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1716:         Msgs = respond_messages(Result),
 1717:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1718:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1719:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1720:         ok
 1721:         end,
 1722:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1723: 
 1724: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1725:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1726:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1727:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1728:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1729: 
 1730:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1731:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1732:         wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, 15)
 1733:         end,
 1734:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1735: 
 1736: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1737:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1738:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1739:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1740:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1741:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1742:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1743:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1744:         ok
 1745:         end,
 1746:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1747:

 1772: pagination_last5(Config) ->

 1780:         ok
 1781:         end,

 1808: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1809:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1810:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1811:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1812:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1813:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1814:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1815:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 10),
 1816:         ok
 1817:         end,
 1818:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1819: 
 1820: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1821:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1822:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1823:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1824:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1825:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1826:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1827:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 15),
 1828:         ok
 1829:         end,
 1830:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1831: 
 1832: 
 1833: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1834:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1835:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1836:         %% Get the last page of size 5.

 1838:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1839:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1840:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 5, 9),
 1841:         ok
 1842:         end,
 1843:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1844: 
 1845: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1846:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1847:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1848:         %% Get the last page of size 5.

 1850:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1851:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1852:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1853:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1854:         ok
 1855:         end,

 1857: 
 1858: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1859:     P = ?config(props, Config),

 1861:         %% Get the last page of size 5.

 1863:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
