 1869: 
 1870: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1871: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1872: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1873:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1874:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1875:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1876:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1877:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1878:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1879:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1880:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1881:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1882:         ok
 1883:         end,
 1884:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1885: 
 1886: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1887: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1888:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1889:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1890:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1891:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1892:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1893:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1894:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1895:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1896:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1897:         ok
 1898:         end,
 1899:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1900: 
 1901: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1902:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1903: 
 1904: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1905:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1906:         true ->
 1907:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1908:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1909:         _ ->
 1910:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1911:     end.
 1912: 
 1913: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1914:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1915:         true ->
 1916:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1917:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1918:         _ ->
 1919:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1920:     end.
 1921: 
 1922: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1923:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1924:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1925:         %% Send
 1926:         %%
 1927:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1928:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1929:         %%     <always>
 1930:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1931:         %%     </always>
 1932:         %%     <never>
 1933:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1934:         %%     </never>
 1935:         %%   </prefs>
 1936:         %% </iq>
 1937:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1938:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1939:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1940:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1941: 
 1942:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1943:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1944: 
 1945:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1946:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1947:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1948:         ok
 1949:         end,
 1950:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1951: 
 1952: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1953: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1954: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1955: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1956: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1957:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1958:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1959:         %% Send
 1960:         %%
 1961:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1962:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1963:         %%     <always>
 1964:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1965:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1966:         %%     </always>
 1967:         %%   </prefs>
 1968:         %% </iq>
 1969:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1970:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1971:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1972:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1973:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1974: 
 1975:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1976:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1977: 
 1978:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1979:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1980:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1981:         ok
 1982:         end,
 1983:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1984: 
 1985: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1986:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1987:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1988:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1989:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1990:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1991:         try
 1992:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1993:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1994:         ok
 1995:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1996:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1997:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1998:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1999:         end
 2000:         end,
 2001:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2002: 
 2003: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 2004: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 2005:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2006:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 2007:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 2008:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 2009:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 2010:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2011:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 2012:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 2013:         ok
 2014:         end,
 2015:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2016: 
 2017: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2018: %% Helpers
 2019: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2020: 
 2021: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 2022: 
 2023: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 2024: mam_ns_binary_v03() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:0">>.
 2025: mam_ns_binary_v04() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:1">>.
 2026: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 2027: 
 2028: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 2029:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2030:        name = <<"purge">>,
 2031:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 2032:     }]).
 2033: 
 2034: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 2035:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2036:        name = <<"purge">>,
 2037:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 2038:        children = skip_undefined([
 2039:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2040:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2041:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 2042:     }]).
 2043: 
 2044: 
 2045: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 2046:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 2047: 
 2048: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 2049:     [];
 2050: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 2051:     [{K, V}].
 2052: 
 2053: mam_ns_attr(P) ->
 2054:     [{<<"xmlns">>,get_prop(mam_ns, P)}].
 2055: 
 2056: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 2057:     undefined;
 2058: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 2059:     #xmlel{
 2060:         name = <<"start">>,
 2061:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = BStart}]}.
 2062: 
 2063: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 2064:     undefined;
 2065: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 2066:     #xmlel{
 2067:         name = <<"end">>,
 2068:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = BEnd}]}.
 2069: 
 2070: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 2071:     undefined;
 2072: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 2073:     #xmlel{
 2074:         name = <<"with">>,
 2075:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}]}.
 2076: 
 2077: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 2078: %% a certain query.
 2079: stanza_archive_request(P, QueryId) ->
 2080:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId,
 2081:                               undefined, undefined,
 2082:                               undefined, undefined).
 2083: 
 2084: stanza_date_range_archive_request(P) ->
 2085:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 2086:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 2087:                               undefined, undefined).
 2088: 
 2089: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, Start, Stop) ->
 2090:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 2091:                               Start, Stop,
 2092:                               undefined, undefined).
 2093: 
 2094: stanza_limit_archive_request(P) ->
 2095:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 2096:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 2097: 
 2098: stanza_page_archive_request(P, QueryId, RSM) ->
 2099:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 2100: 
 2101: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID) ->
 2102:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, undefined,
 2103:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 2104: 
 2105: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2106:     case get_prop(data_form, P) of
 2107:         false ->
 2108:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM);
 2109:         true ->
 2110:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM)
 2111:     end.
 2112: 
 2113: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2114:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2115:        name = <<"query">>,
 2116:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2117:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId),
 2118:        children = skip_undefined([
 2119:            form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM),
 2120:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2121:     }]).
 2122: 
 2123: 
 2124: form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2125:     #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2126:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:data">>}],
 2127:            children = skip_undefined([
 2128:                 form_field(<<"start">>, BStart),
 2129:                 form_field(<<"end">>, BEnd),
 2130:                 form_field(<<"with">>, BWithJID)]
 2131:                 ++ form_extra_fields(RSM)
 2132:                 ++ form_border_fields(RSM))}.
 2133: 
 2134: form_extra_fields(undefined) ->
 2135:     [];
 2136: form_extra_fields(#rsm_in{simple=Simple, opt_count=OptCount}) ->
 2137:     [form_bool_field(<<"simple">>, Simple),
 2138:      form_bool_field(<<"opt_count">>, OptCount)].
 2139: 
 2140: form_border_fields(undefined) ->
 2141:     [];
 2142: form_border_fields(#rsm_in{
 2143:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2144:     [form_field(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId),
 2145:      form_field(<<"after_id">>, AfterId),
 2146:      form_field(<<"from_id">>, FromId),
 2147:      form_field(<<"to_id">>, ToId)].
 2148: 
 2149: form_type_field(MamNs) ->
 2150:     form_field(<<"FORM_TYPE">>, MamNs).
 2151: 
 2152: form_field(VarName, undefined) ->
 2153:     undefined;
 2154: form_field(VarName, VarValue) ->
 2155:     #xmlel{name = <<"field">>, attrs = [{<<"var">>, VarName}],
 2156:            children = [#xmlel{name = <<"value">>,
 2157:                               children = [#xmlcdata{content = VarValue}]}]}.
 2158: 
 2159: form_bool_field(Name, true) ->
 2160:     form_field(Name, <<"true">>);
 2161: form_bool_field(Name, _) ->
 2162:     undefined.
 2163: 
 2164: 
 2165: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2166:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2167:        name = <<"query">>,
 2168:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2169:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 2170:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 2171:        children = skip_undefined([
 2172:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 2173:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 2174:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2175:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2176:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 2177:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2178:     }]).
 2179: 
 2180: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 2181:     #xmlel{name = <<"simple">>};
 2182: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 2183:     undefined.
 2184: 
 2185: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 2186:     #xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>};
 2187: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 2188:     undefined.
 2189: 
 2190: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 2191:     [];
 2192: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 2193:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2194:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 2195:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 2196:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 2197:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 2198: 
 2199: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 2200:     undefined;
 2201: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 2202:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 2203:            children = skip_undefined([
 2204:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 2205:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 2206:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 2207: 
 2208: rsm_id_children(undefined) -> [];
 2209: rsm_id_children(Id) -> [#xmlcdata{content = Id}].
 2210: 
 2211: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 2212:     undefined;
 2213: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 2214:     #xmlel{
 2215:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 2216:         children = rsm_id_children(Id)}.
 2217: 
 2218: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 2219:     undefined;
 2220: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 2221:     #xmlel{
 2222:         name = <<"index">>,
 2223:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}]}.
 2224: 
 2225: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 2226:     undefined;
 2227: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 2228:     #xmlel{
 2229:         name = <<"max">>,
 2230:         children = [#xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}]}.
 2231: 
 2232: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 2233:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 2234:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 2235:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 2236:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 2237: 
 2238: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 2239:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2240:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2241:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 2242: 
 2243: assert_not_stored(Archived, Sent) ->
 2244:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2245:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2246:     ?assert_equal(0, erlang:length(Same)).
 2247: 
 2248: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 2249:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 2250:     A =:= Raw.
 2251: 
 2252: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2253: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 2254: 
 2255: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 2256:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2257:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 2258:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2259:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 2260:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2261:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2262:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2263:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 2264:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 2265:     }]).
 2266: 
 2267: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 2268:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2269:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2270:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2271:     }]).
 2272: 
 2273: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 2274: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 2275:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 2276: 
 2277: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 2278:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 2279: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 2280:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 2281:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 2282: 
 2283: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2284: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 2285: 
 2286: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2287:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2288:     M = #forwarded_message{
 2289:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2290:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2291:         has_x_user_element = false},
 2292:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 2293: 
 2294: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 2295:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 2296:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 2297:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2298:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 2299:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2300:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 2301: 
 2302: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 2303:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 2304:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 2305: 
 2306: 
 2307: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 2308:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2309:     M#forwarded_message{
 2310:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2311:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 2312: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2313:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 2314:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 2315:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2316:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2317:         message_from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2318:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2319:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 2320:                 M1, Children).
 2321: 
 2322: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 2323:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 2324:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 2325: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2326:         attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2327:     IsUser = lists:member({<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#user">>}, Attrs),
 2328:     M#forwarded_message{has_x_user_element = IsUser};
 2329: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 2330: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 2331:     M.
 2332: 
 2333: %% Num is 1-based.
 2334: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 2335:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 2336:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 2337:     Id.
 2338: 
 2339: 
 2340: %% @doc Result query iq.
 2341: %%
 2342: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2343: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2344: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2345: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 2346: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2347: %%     []}]
 2348: %%
 2349: %%
 2350: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2351: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2352: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2353: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 2354: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2355: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 2356: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 2357: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 2358: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 2359: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 2360: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 2361: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 2362: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 2363: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 2364: parse_result_iq(P, Result) ->
 2365:     case get_prop(result_format, P) of
 2366:         mess_fin ->
 2367:             parse_fin_and_iq(Result);
 2368:         iq_query ->
 2369:             parse_legacy_iq(respond_iq(Result));
 2370:         iq_fin ->
 2371:             parse_fin_iq(Result)
 2372:     end.
 2373: 
 2374: %% MAM v0.3
 2375: parse_fin_and_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=FinMsg}) ->
 2376:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(FinMsg, <<"fin">>),
 2377:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2378:     QueryId = exml_query:attr(Fin, <<"queryid">>),
 2379:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, QueryId).
 2380: 
 2381: %% MAM v0.4
 2382: parse_fin_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=undefined}) ->
 2383:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"fin">>),
 2384:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2385:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, not_supported).
 2386: 
 2387: %% MAM v0.2
 2388: parse_legacy_iq(IQ) ->
 2389:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"query">>),
 2390:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2391:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, not_supported).
 2392: 
 2393: parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set, QueryId) ->
 2394:     #result_iq{
 2395:         query_id    = QueryId,
 2396:         from        = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"from">>),
 2397:         to          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"to">>),
 2398:         id          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"id">>),
 2399:         first       = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, cdata]),
 2400:         first_index = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, {attr, <<"index">>}])),
 2401:         last        = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"last">>}, cdata]),
 2402:         count       = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"count">>}, cdata]))}.
 2403: 
 2404: 
 2405: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 2406: 
 2407: 
 2408: 
 2409: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 2410:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 2411:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2412: 
 2413: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 2414:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 2415:                            IQ) ->
 2416:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 2417:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 2418:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 2419: 
 2420: 
 2421: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2422:                                         children = Children},
 2423:                                  IQ) ->
 2424:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 2425: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2426:                                         children = Children},
 2427:                                  IQ) ->
 2428:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 2429: 
 2430: 
 2431: parse_jids(Els) ->
 2432:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 2433:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 2434: 
 2435: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 2436: %%   <error type='modify'>
 2437: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 2438: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 2439: %%   </error>
 2440: %% </iq>
 2441: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 2442:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2443: 
 2444:     IQ = #error_iq{
 2445:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 2446:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2447:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2448: 
 2449: 
 2450: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 2451:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 2452:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 2453:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2454:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 2455: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 2456:     IQ.
 2457: 
 2458: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 2459:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 2460:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 2461: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 2462:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 2463: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 2464:     IQ.
 2465: 
 2466: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2467: %% Helpers (muc)
 2468: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2469: 
 2470: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 2471:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 2472:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 2473:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 2474:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 2475:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 2476: 
 2477: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 2478:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 2479:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2480:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2481:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2482:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}, {anonymous, false}]).
 2483: 
 2484: start_alice_protected_room(Config) ->
 2485:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2486:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2487:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2488:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick,
 2489:                [{persistent, true},
 2490:                 {password_protected, true},
 2491:                 {password, <<"secret">>}]).
 2492: 
 2493: start_alice_anonymous_room(Config) ->
 2494:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2495:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2496:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2497:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{anonymous, true}]).
 2498: 
 2499: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2500:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2501:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2502:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2503:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2504: 
 2505: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2506:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2507:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2508:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2509:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2510:         _ -> ok
 2511:     end.
 2512: 
 2513: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2514:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2515:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2516:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2517:                    Room, Nick).
 2518: 
 2519: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2520:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2521: 
 2522: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2523:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2524: 
 2525: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2526:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2527: 
 2528: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2529:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2530: 
 2531: 
 2532: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2533:     Pid = self(),
 2534:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2535:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2536:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2537:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2538:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2539:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2540: 
 2541:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2542:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2543: 
 2544:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2545:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2546:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2547:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2548:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2549:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2550:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2551: 
 2552:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2553: 
 2554:         %% Get whole history.
 2555:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2556:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2557:         AllMessages =
 2558:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2559:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2560:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2561:         ok
 2562:         end,
 2563:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2564:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2565:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2566:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2567: 
 2568:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2569:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2570: 
 2571: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2572:     Pid = self(),
 2573:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2574:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2575:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2576:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2577:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2578:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2579:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2580:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2581:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2582:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2583:         %% Get whole history.
 2584:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_messages">>)),
 2585:         AllMessages =
 2586:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2587:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2588:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2589:         ok
 2590:         end,
 2591:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2592:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2593:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2594:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2595: 
 2596:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2597:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2598: 
 2599: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2600:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2601: 
 2602: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2603:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2604:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2605: 
 2606: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2607:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2608:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2609:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2610:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2611:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2612:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U, 10) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2613:     Config.
 2614: 
 2615: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2616:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2617:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2618:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2619:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room, 10),
 2620:     Config.
 2621: 
 2622: serv_users(Config) ->
 2623:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2624:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2625: 
 2626: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2627:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2628:     {Server, Username}.
 2629: 
 2630: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2631: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) when is_integer(RetryTimes) -> 
 2632:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2633:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2634:        0 -> ok;
 2635:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2636:     end.
 2637: 
 2638: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2639:     archive_size(Server, Username);
 2640: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2641:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2642:         ExpectedSize ->
 2643:             ExpectedSize;
 2644:         _ActualSize ->
 2645:             %% Wait and retry
 2646:             timer:sleep(100),
 2647:             wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2648:     end.
 2649: 
 2650: wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) ->
 2651:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) of
 2652:         ExpectedSize -> ok;
 2653:         ActualSize ->
 2654:             ct:pal("issue=wait_for_archive_size_or_warning, expected_size=~p, actual_size=~p",
 2655:                    [ExpectedSize, ActualSize])
 2656:     end.
 2657: 
 2658: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2659: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) ->
 2660:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2661:     case wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2662:        0 -> ok;
 2663:        X -> ct:fail({room_not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2664:     end.
 2665: 
 2666: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2667:     room_archive_size(Server, Username);
 2668: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2669:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2670:         ExpectedSize ->
 2671:             ExpectedSize;
 2672:         _ActualSize ->
 2673:             %% Wait and retry
 2674:             timer:sleep(100),
 2675:             wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2676:     end.
 2677: 
 2678: 
 2679: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2680:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2681: 
 2682: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2683:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2684: 
 2685: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2686:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2687: 
 2688: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2689:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2690: 
 2691: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2692:     %% Do not care
 2693:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2694:     ok.
 2695: 
 2696: wait_message_range(P, Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2697:     wait_message_range(P, Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2698: 
 2699: wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2700:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Client),
 2701:     Messages = respond_messages(Result),
 2702:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2703:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2704:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2705:     try
 2706:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2707:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2708:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2709:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2710:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2711:         ok
 2712:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2713:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2714:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2715:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2716:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2717:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2718:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2719:     end.
 2720: 
 2721: 
 2722: wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2723:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2724:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2725:     ?assert_equal([], respond_messages(Result)),
 2726:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2727:     try
 2728:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2729:         ok
 2730:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2731:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2732:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2733:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2734:     end.
 2735: 
 2736: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2737:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2738:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2739:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2740:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2741:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2742:     end.
 2743: 
 2744: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2745:     random:seed(now()),
 2746:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2747:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2748:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2749:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2750:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2751:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2752:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2753:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2754:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2755:     AllUsers = [{Domain, <<"alice">>}, {Domain, <<"bob">>}, {Domain, <<"carol">>}],
 2756:     wait_for_msgs(Msgs, AllUsers),
 2757: 
 2758:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2759: 
 2760: %% Wait for messages to be written
 2761: wait_for_msgs(Msgs, Users) ->
 2762:     UsersCnt = [{S, U, count_msgs(Msgs, S, U)} || {S, U} <- Users],
 2763:     [wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(S, U, 10, C) || {S, U, C} <- UsersCnt],
 2764:     ok.
 2765: 
 2766: count_msgs(Msgs, S, U) ->
 2767:     Bin = <<U/binary, "@", S/binary>>,
 2768:     length([1 ||
 2769:             {_,
 2770:              {FromBin, _FromJID, _FromArcID},
 2771:              {ToBin, _ToJID, _ToArcID}, _, _Packet} <- Msgs,
 2772:            FromBin =:= Bin orelse ToBin =:= Bin]).
 2773: 
 2774: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2775:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2776:         ID1 =< ID2
 2777:     end,
 2778:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2779: 
 2780: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2781:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2782:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2783:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2784:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2785:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2786: 
 2787: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2788:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2789: 
 2790:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2791:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2792: 
 2793: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2794:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2795:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2796:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2797:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2798:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2799:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2800:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2801: 
 2802: random_time() ->
 2803:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2804:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2805:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2806: 
 2807: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2808:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2809:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2810:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2811:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2812: 
 2813: 
 2814: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2815:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2816: 
 2817: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2818:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2819:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2820:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2821:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2822:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2823:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2824: 
 2825: archive_message(Args) ->
 2826:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2827: 
 2828: 
 2829: 
 2830: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2831:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2832: 
 2833:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2834:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2835:     R = room_address(Room),
 2836: 
 2837:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2838:     Host = host(),
 2839:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2840:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2841:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2842:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2843:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2844:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2845:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2846:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2847: 
 2848:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2849: 
 2850:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2851: 
 2852:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2853: 
 2854: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2855:     Host = host(),
 2856:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2857: 
 2858: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2859:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2860:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2861:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2862:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2863: 
 2864: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2865: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2866:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2867:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2868: 
 2869: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2870:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2871: 
 2872: 
 2873: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2874:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2875: 
 2876: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2877:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2878:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2879:         Other ->
 2880:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2881:             false
 2882:     end.
 2883: 
 2884: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2885:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2886:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2887:             true;
 2888:         _ ->
 2889:             false
 2890:     end.
 2891: 
 2892: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2893:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2894: 
 2895: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2896:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2897:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2898:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2899:     Client.
 2900: 
 2901: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2902:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2903:         undefined ->
 2904:             ok;
 2905:         Value ->
 2906:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2907:     end.
 2908: 
 2909: 
 2910: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2911: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2912: %%
 2913: %% Messages:
 2914: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2915: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2916: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2917: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2918: %%
 2919: %% Each tuple is
 2920: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2921: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2922: prefs_cases2() ->
 2923:     [
 2924:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2925:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2926:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2927:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2928:  
 2929:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2930:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2931:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2932:  
 2933:  
 2934:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2935:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2936:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2937:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2938:  
 2939:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2940:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2941:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2942:  
 2943:  
 2944:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2945:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2946:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2947:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2948:  
 2949:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2950:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2951:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2952:     ].
 2953: 
 2954: %% First write all messages, than read and check
 2955: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2956:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2957:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2958:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2959:         %% Just send messages for each prefs configuration
 2960:         Funs = [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()],
 2961: 
 2962:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2963: 
 2964:         %% Get ALL messages using several queries if required
 2965:         Stanzas = get_all_messages(P, Alice),
 2966:         ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2967:         Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2968: 
 2969:         %% Check messages, print out all failed cases
 2970:         Fails = lists:append([Fun(Bodies) || Fun <- Funs]),
 2971:         %% If fails consult with ct:pal/2 why
 2972:         ?assert_equal([], Fails)
 2973:         end,
 2974:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2975: 
 2976: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2977:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2978:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2979:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2980: 
 2981:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2982:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2983:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2984: 
 2985:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2986:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2987:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2988: 
 2989:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2990:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2991:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2992:         ok.
 2993: 
 2994: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2995:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2996:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2997:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2998:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2999:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 3000:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 3001:     %% Messages:
 3002:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 3003:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 3004:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 3005:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 3006:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 3007:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 3008:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 3009:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 3010:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 3011:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 3012:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 3013:     %% Delay check
 3014:     fun(Bodies) ->
 3015:         ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 3016:         ?_assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 3017:                              [{prefs_state, PrefsState}])
 3018:     end.
 3019: 
 3020: get_last_four_messages(P, Alice) ->
 3021:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 3022:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 3023:     respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)).
 3024: 
 3025: get_all_messages(P, Alice) ->
 3026:     get_all_messages(P, Alice, undefined).
 3027: 
 3028: get_all_messages(P, Alice, Id) ->
 3029:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=50, direction='after', id=Id},
 3030:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"page_rsm">>, RSM)),
 3031:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 3032:     PageMessages = respond_messages(Result),
 3033:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 3034:     #result_iq{last=LastId} = ParsedIQ,
 3035:     case PageMessages of
 3036:         [] ->
 3037:             [];
 3038:         [_|_] ->
 3039:             PageMessages ++ get_all_messages(P, Alice, LastId)
 3040:     end.
 3041: 
 3042: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 3043:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 3044:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 3045:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 3046:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 3047: 
 3048: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 3049:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 3050: 
 3051: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 3052:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 3053:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 3054:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 3055: 
 3056: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 3057: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 3058:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 3059:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3060:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()]
 3061:         end,
 3062:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3063: 
 3064: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 3065: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 3066:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 3067:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 3068:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 3069: 
 3070:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 3071:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3072: 
 3073:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 3074:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 3075:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 3076:     ok.
 3077: 
 3078: maybe_binary_to_integer(B) when is_binary(B) ->
 3079:     list_to_integer(binary_to_list(B));
 3080: maybe_binary_to_integer(undefined) ->
 3081:     undefined.
 3082: 
 3083: add_nostore_hint(#xmlel{children=Children}=Elem) ->
 3084:     Elem#xmlel{children=Children ++ [nostore_hint_elem()]}.
 3085: 
 3086: nostore_hint_elem() ->
 3087:     #xmlel{name = <<"no-store">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:hints">>}]}.
 3088: 
 3089: has_x_user_element(ArcMsg) ->
 3090:     ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 3091:     ParsedMess#forwarded_message.has_x_user_element.
